title: Kirk Minihane Names the Designated Survivor for Saturday
description:
After careful consideration, Kirk Minihane has named the designated survivor for Saturday's prayer vigil, the noble individual who will not attend so as to preserve the Minifan legacy should ISIS strike. Blind Mike gets back in the prank call game with a hit on Big Cat's Chicago nemeses. The crew decides to take West Virginia off the board themselves. The Washington Post offers a hagiography for a dead terrorist. President Trump is booed at the World Series. Kanye West is a big Chick-fil-a fan. Steve Robinson might be able to dunk but he's probably still a Russian agent.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
